subject: missing parts
description_text:
I bought the Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedals, including the plate. I only
received the plate, but the pedals weren't included. The package was as big
as a painting. I thought it would arrive later, so I waited until today. I
was skeptical, so I checked the tracking, and it says it was delivered
successfully...
I never received the pedals.

This is the tracking number:
SF6047208882831

conversations.body_text: I bought it on Amazon, this is the order number        Ordine # â€«407-2012022-1225135
